name: Josiane Nda
text: I am in love with the grilled chicken Caesar salad. It’s very good and that’s the only thing I ever get from here.

name: alberto rodriguez
text: Have always been a fan of their food. Just tried their rice bowl today and I'll definitely be ordering it again!

name: bobby junior
text: Great staff.  Hot food.  Got it right the first time

name: JG77 Northeast
text: Really good sandwiches, grinders, etc. Better than a cookie cutter Subway. Staff polite, friendly and service is quick.

name: Kevin McClelland
text: Cheese steaks are fantastic. The Manager was very friendly to the customers, but annoyingly awful to the staff in earshot of everyone. Made waiting for my sandwich very uncomfortable. I'll go back, but if it is the same way, that will be the last time.

name: Adam K
text: D'angelos has always made a good sub with quality ingredients.  Other sub and sandwich chains have come around but don't make anything nearly as good. I used to love the number 9 these days my favorite combination there is the Thanksgiving sub with extra cranberry sauce and I skippe the gravy.

name: Geoff Krajeski
text: Great catering options for small or large parties. Got deli sandwiches for 6-8 at only $25. Thoughtful to offer plates, extra condiments, and napkins. Quick in & out for a medium order.

name: Mark Sharp
text: Lobster Roll on the Mass Pike.  That is what brings me there when I'm in New England.  So tasty, especially when you are on the go.

name: Kimberly Kehl
text: Absolutely loved how tasty my sandwiches were. I don't have this chain near where I live so looking forward to my next trip to stop and eat here again

name: SEXY FIBROMOM
text: I usually don't wait very long for my food, but tonight was awful. I still enjoyed my food.

name: Clayvern Fothergill
text: Not good, really small amount of Lobster on the sandwich. I've had this same sandwich in the WestHarfod store and it was terrific, East Hartford, I will not visit again. Unhappy...

name: Daylee Epps
text: Great place to eat general manager always knows my order before I walk in the door!

name: Dennis Desilet
text: Great service. Manager Christina is a great example of enthusiastic customer service and treating each contact as an opportunity to make a difference.

name: John Cody
text: Good value for the most part. The manager and staff were nice and provided a pleasant dining experience.

name: Muñeca07510
text: Food portion is really small. And do not order the lobster bisc it's just creamy broth with nothing in it. I called and they said it shouldn't have anything it's a broth. When I order at a restaurant it comes with pieces of lobster and crab. Smh

name: Rae Reyes
text: Great subs! Me and my dad usually go here whenever we visit my aunt. Good service and the place is nice.

name: Kristine Clark
text: Joshua the manager got that place cranking out sandwiches like a a champ really really good!

name: Ivette Muniz
text: Great service awesome personnel great food.

name: Stephanie Seal
text: Christina at the East Hartford D'Angelo runs an awesome restaurant! My salad was perfect.

name: Jim Linke
text: Nice place for a quick sandwich. Fair price with a small selection.

name: Bro E
text: If subway had an slightly better older sister/brother

name: Ken C
text: Really good grinders, they are made to order. I only wish they had monthly promotions at this location.

name: Travis Misiek
text: Great clean location, awesome friendly staff! They just need to get the old turkey back...but that's corporates fault.

name: Vishal Tambolkar
text: Nice and testy sandwich, less veggie options.. good and fast service. Polit staff to help...

name: eric drake
text: As far as D'Angelo's go this place is large customer-friendly clean and pretty quick with your order

name: Kurt L
text: Portions size are way to small for the price that i paid. Subway gives more meat in there grinders. Not to impressed  and the wait was to long.

name: Anita Bell
text: I am a vegetarian loved the grill veggie  pocket.

name: r_e_a_l_e_s_t_1 Instagram
text: One of the best restaurants in east hartford rn

name: AJ Belanger
text: kind of dull staff but who cares they've made a great meal for me every time

name: iEric
text: Delightful experience. The staff were very (very) kind.

name: Captain Marvell
text: Great lobster roll and good deal

name: James Davis
text: Great sandwich, good food, nice place, check it out!

name: Mike Duncan
text: Food is ok for a quick bite, although not worth the money

name: Jen Motta
text: Order ahead, slow service.  Good grinder though.

name: jc musix
text:
Went here a few weeks and got a tough and fatty cheesesteak, but got a much better steakbomb tonight.
Not a bad sub shop.
Cold cut sub was pretty good.

name: M B
text: Good prices, hot off the grill sandwiches. No salt issues.

name: TTO215 TS
text: Everything on the menu is very delicious and you'll get your monies worth and most likely leave satisfied

name: William Kane
text: I recommend using the club card they offer. You get $5.00 for every $50.00 spent.

name: Carmen Rosa
text: I love their grilled sandwiches with a bowl of soup! Yummmmm!

name: David Dias
text: Don't come during the lunch rush unless you're prepared to stand around for 10-15 minutes and watch people who were behind you in line get food before. A little line management and maybe another staff member during busy hours would help.

name: Ryan Tangney
text: Go to another one. I get sick from this one every time. Love the chain though.

name: Taz Cruz
text: This D'Angelo is one of the best customer service food clean and everything else I've been to a lot of other D'Angelo's that doesn't have the great employees that they have in this building

name: Aundrea Cook
text: Good customer service and great steak and cheese

name: James mcguire
text: Best chicken #9 Ever!

name: Haisan Schand
text: Great man. Just great

name: Danny Torres
text: Good food an great service

name: John Proctor
text: Understaffed, orders after mine served before me, in total took 35 minutes for 2 grilled chicken salads.

name: Click This
text: best sandwich ive ever had in my life!!!! i even brought my friend there later again in the night too bad i went back late they were closed but ilo be going back soon...i love deangelo's

name: Ramin Rafatpanah
text: Clean location with friendly service.

name: Taylor Strack
text: Been going here for a while now. Best sub shop in EH.

name: Robert Alvarado
text: Great food! Great service and workers!

name: Trenton Sweet
text: Simillar to subway, warm sandwiches

name: joseph benejan
text: Love the food, I'd eat it all day

name: Phil R
text: Great subs and good selection, everything fresh. Was busy when I went.

name: Gregory Rich
text: Great sandwiches. Service was rather slow.

name: Cathy Green
text: Great #9 steak and cheese

name: Sharmel Taffe
text: Considering I don't eat some restaurants they make great sandwiches couldn't have done it better

name: Jackie Viens
text: Awesome burgers.

name: James S
text: Got steak and cheese. Kinda skimpy on the large.

name: Aminu Ibrahim
text: Nice

name: Alfonso Francavilla
text: If you have to...

name: Jennifer Roy
text: Great

name: Josie labissiere
text: Yummy

name: Zaffiris Venoutsos
text: Love it

name: Bruce Atwater
text: Grinders are excellent

name: Clary Carrion
text: Lobster rolls!

name: Melixa Rivers
text: Like this spot

name: A. Jamie Nelson
text: Love it

name: Carol Jacques
text: Skimpy ingredients in the Number 9.

name: Timothy Rhone
text: Number 9# the best

name: Michael Fanelli
text: Good

name: jenny roberts
text: Great staff always friendly

name: Tattiana McNair
text: They are unprofessional

name: howie nyb
text: Love the thanks giving toast

name: The Drummer
text: Great food.

name: Antonio White
text: Lost a lot of luster

name: Deanna Howard
text: Fast service

name: Yolanda M
text: Steak #9 is delicious!

name: Sherrie Gilbert
text: The Grinders are way too small

name: Marva Patterson
text: The bathrooms we're out of order! The service was not friendly.

name: Karla Aponte
text: Pretty good

name: David Whitesell
text: Standard D'Angelos

name: Bianca Cartagena
text: Steak bomb! !! Always made right...

name: Kimi Braun
text: Always a decent meal here.

name: Robin Allen
text: The sandwiches are delicious but the music is too darn loud. The order taker can barely hear your order and we couldn't even hear our name called.

name: Tanya May
text:
(Translated by Google) Amen Amen

(Original)
Amen Amen
